source: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_SEQ_00<tab>Yadovv Gah means to use the nature of the Amalj'aa's blessings against them.
target: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_SEQ_00<tab>Yadovv Gah cherche un moyen d'affaiblir l'aura protectrice d'Ifrit.

source: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_SEQ_01<tab>Yadovv Gah suspects that the voracious flames of Ifrit's blessings will feed upon each other, and has enlisted your aid to test his theory in practice. Pass through the gates of Zahar'ak, and first hunt down fortune-tellers for their wildfire idols.
target: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_SEQ_01<tab>Yadovv Gah a pour projet de détruire des <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E88E30302 /var> en les jetant dans <var 33 ((EObj)) 02F61E8FE60202 /var>. Procurez-vous deux <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E88E30302 /var> en combattant des <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 0DF208FF0302 /var>.

source: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_SEQ_02<tab>You have slain fortune-tellers and obtained a pair of wildfire idols. Find the Inferno altar in the north of Zahar'ak, and cast the idols into its flames.
target: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez obtenu les deux <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E88E30302 /var>. Utilisez-les sur <var 33 ((EObj)) 03F61E8FE60202 /var> au nord de Zahar'ak.

source: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_SEQ_03<tab>You consign the wildfire idols to the fires of the Inferno altar, and the resulting conflagration reduces everything in the vicinity to slag and charcoal. Return to the Ring of Ash and report to Yadovv Gah.
target: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez utilisé les <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E88E30302 /var> sur <var 33 ((EObj)) 03F61E8FE60202 /var>. Retournez à présent faire votre rapport à Yadovv Gah.

source: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_SEQ_04<tab>Yadovv Gah seems both elated and relieved at the success of his plan. With such tactics proven to be effective, it is only a matter of time before the fragile strength of the Zahar'ak Amalj'aa is shattered completely.
target: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_SEQ_04<tab>Yadovv Gah se réjouit du succès de son plan. Il compte sur votre aide pour d'éventuelles futures missions.

source: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_TODO_00<tab>Slay Zahar'ak fortune-tellers and obtain wildfire idols.
TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_TODO_01<tab>Cast wildfire idols into the Inferno altar.

target: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_TODO_02<tab>Faire un rapport à Yadovv Gah

source: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_YADOVVGAH_000_000<tab>Have you met with the fortune-tellers of Zahar'ak in battle, honored ally? Each of these mystics carries a ritual tool known as a wildfire idol.
target: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_YADOVVGAH_000_000<tab>Des objets appelés “<var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E88E30302 /var>” il y a au cœur de Zahar'ak. Ces fétiches, les devins utilisent pour leurs cérémonies.

source: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_YADOVVGAH_000_001<tab>It is an iron statuette forged in the sacred flames of Ifrit, and possessed of a potent aura that invigorates any of the faithful that draw near. Though we have seized several of these idols before, their god-tempered nature rendered them irritatingly difficult to destroy.
target: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_YADOVVGAH_000_001<tab>Animés d'une aura mystérieuse, ces objets sont. En acier renforcé par le feu divin, ils ont été fabriqués. Très forte, leur puissance protectrice est. Quasi indestructibles, cela les rend.

source: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_YADOVVGAH_000_002<tab>But if we are to deny our hated enemy every advantage, then destroy them we must! I have thought long on this matter, and the mindless, raging nature of Ifrit's blessings might be made to work in our favor.
target: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_YADOVVGAH_000_002<tab>Arriver à voler et détruire ces <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E88E30302 /var>, il nous faudrait. D'affaiblir nos ennemis, éliminer ce vecteur de l'aura nous permettrait. Cette idée, j'aimerais donc mettre en œuvre.

source: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_YADOVVGAH_000_003<tab>Our demented kin also draw strength from the fires of the Inferno altar. Casting wildfire idols into its flames will cause the blessings to feed one upon the other, igniting a conflagration violent enough to ensure their mutual destruction.
target: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_YADOVVGAH_000_003<tab>Un moyen de le détruire, il faut cependant trouver. Dans l'autel sacré de ces devins, une flamme d'Ifrit brûle. Jeter les <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E88E30302 /var> dans le feu de celui-ci, nous pourrions. Détruire les objets en même temps que l'autel, l'énergie dégagée pourrait peut-être.

source: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_YADOVVGAH_000_004<tab>Is your task clear, honored ally? Hunt down the Zahar'ak fortune-tellers and relieve them of their ritual tools.
target: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_YADOVVGAH_000_004<tab>Puissant<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> guerri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var><var 1D /var>! À toi, je fais appel. Vaincre des <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 0DF208FF0302 /var> pour leur arracher ces <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E88E30302 /var>, tu devras.

source:
TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_YADOVVGAH_000_005Bear the idols to the Inferno altar, and hurl them into the flames!
...Be sure to stand back from the explosion, honored ally. I would not have you perish in such a foolish manner.
target: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_YADOVVGAH_000_005<tab>Puis les <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E88E30302 /var> tu jetteras dans <var 33 ((EObj)) 03F61E8FE60202 /var>. Détruire ces objets impies qui diffusent l'aura du Dieu des flammes, nous devons<var 1D /var>! D'une pierre deux coups, nous ferions<var 1D /var>! Combattre le feu par le feu, nous pourrons ainsi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_YADOVVGAH_000_010<tab>Make your way into the depths of Zahar'ak and slay the fortune-tellers for their wildfire idols.
target: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_YADOVVGAH_000_010<tab>Vaincre des <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 0DF208FF0302 /var> pour récupérer les <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E88E30302 /var>, tu devras.

source: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_YADOVVGAH_000_011<tab>Take the ritual tools and cast them into the Inferno altar. The flames of their blessings will feed upon each other, consuming with mindless hunger until nothing but ash remains!
target: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_YADOVVGAH_000_011<tab>Puis ces <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E88E30302 /var> tu jetteras dans <var 33 ((EObj)) 03F61E8FE60202 /var>. D'une pierre deux coups, nous ferons en détruisant ces objets impies qui diffusent l'aura du Dieu des flammes.

source: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_SYSTEM_001_030<tab>The potent energies of the wildfire idols cause the flames of the Inferno altar to rage out of control!
target: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_SYSTEM_001_030<tab>La flamme <var 33 ((EObj)) 0AF61E8FE60202 /var> est attisée par l'énergie des <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E88E30302 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_YADOVVGAH_000_020<tab>Was my plan a success? Ah, the fortunes of battle favor the bold!
target: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_YADOVVGAH_000_020<tab>Ô puissant<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> guerri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var><var 1D /var>! Ta mission de destruction des <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E88E30302 /var> et <var 33 ((EObj)) 0AF61E8FE60202 /var>, tu as mené à bien.

source: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_YADOVVGAH_000_021<tab>Again, the illusion of my addled kin's strength is revealed. When power is not earned, there is no control. You have proven the truth of that, honored ally.
target: TEXT_BANAMA306_01247_YADOVVGAH_000_021<tab>Incertaine, la réussite de ce plan était. Mais de joie, ton succès me remplit. Une bonne leçon pour nos ennemis, cela sera.
